title: Brentford v Chelsea: Premier League – live
summary: Chelsea is set to face Brentford in a West London derby at the Gtech Community Stadium. Xaymaca Awoyungbo will be covering the match. Fans can expect an exciting showdown between the two local rivals.

title: The age of Guardiola is waning and the game’s guru is baffled by what comes next | Jonathan Wilson
summary: Pepism, once the dominant tactical approach in football, is now losing its influence as the sport evolves. This shift reflects broader changes in the game and its innovative strategies. Football is currently experiencing a period of uncertainty regarding its tactical direction.

title: Bottles thrown at police as 100 officers clash with ‘unite the kingdom’ marchers – UK politics live
summary: The Met Police estimated that approximately 110,000 people participated in a rally, while a smaller group of counter-protesters was contained in a designated area. The event highlighted significant public interest and differing viewpoints. The contrasting gatherings raised concerns over safety and public order.

title: West Ham 0-3 Tottenham: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Tottenham secured a convincing victory against West Ham at the London Stadium, with goals from Pape Matar Sarr, Lucas Bergvall, and Micky van de Ven. The result showcased Tottenham's strong attacking performance. The win highlights their impressive form in the league.

title: Tottenham humiliate 10-man West Ham to deepen gloom of home fans
summary: Tottenham secured a decisive 3-0 victory against West Ham, with all three goals coming in the second half. West Ham's efforts were hampered by the red card issued to Tomas Soucek. The win strengthens Tottenham's position in the league.
